sentences.sContent: Most of the relief work was done by volunteers.
sentences.sCn: 大部分救援工作都由志愿人员完成。

sentences.sContent: I volunteered my services as a driver.

words.tran: 自愿的；志愿的；自发的；故意的

trans.tranOther: someone who does a job willingly without being paid
to offer to do something without expecting any reward, often something that other people do not want to do
